geneference is an R package for simulating and analysing genetic data.

The package was developed during the Data Project course, which is part of the Data Science bachelor programme at Aarhus University.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("FireGutter/geneference")
```
